item.name: Abacus
item.description: A standard tool used to make calculations.

item.name: Alchemist's Fire
item.description: A sticky, adhesive fluid that ignites when exposed to air. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.

item.name: Anti-toxin
item.description: A creature that drinks this vial of liquid gains advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour. It confers no benefit to undead or constructs.

item.name: Backpack
item.description:
A backpack is a leather pack carried on the back, typically with straps to secure it. A backpack can hold 1 cubic foot/ 30 pounds of gear.

You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

item.name: Ball Bearings
item.description: As an action, you can spill these tiny metal balls from their pouch to cover a level, square area that is 10 feet on a side. A creature moving across the covered area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the save.

item.name: Barrel
item.description: An entire fucking barrel. Great job planning this one out, smart guy.

item.name: Basket
item.description: A basket can hold 2 cubic feet/40 pounds of gear.

item.name: Bedroll
item.description: You never know where you’re going to sleep, and a bedroll helps you get better sleep in a hayloft or on the cold ground. A bedroll consists of bedding and a blanket thin enough to be rolled up and tied. In an emergency, it can double as a stretcher.

item.name: Bell
item.description: A small bell that makes a light sound as it's disturbed.

item.name: Blanket
item.description: Brings comfort to those dark and damp nights when your bed is but a memory of comforts long gone.

item.name: Block and Tackle
item.description: A set of pulleys with a cable threaded through them and a hook to attach to objects, a block and tackle allows you to hoist up to four times the weight you can normally lift.

item.name: Bomb
item.description: As an action, a character can light this bomb and throw it at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 3d6 fire damage.

item.name: Bottle of Glass
item.description: A bottle can hold 1 1/2 pints of liquid.

item.name: Bucket
item.description: A bucket can hold 3 gallons of liquid, or 1/2 cubic foot of solid material. Makes for a good makeshift helmet. This is a bucket.

item.name: Caltrops
item.description: A bag of 20 caltrops.

item.name: Candles (10)
item.description: For 1 hour, a candle sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

item.name: Chains
item.description: A 10 foot long chain that has 10 hit points. It can be burst with a successful DC 20 Strength check.

item.name: Chalk (1 piece)
item.description: A piece of chalk used for writing and marking on various surfaces.

item.name: Chest
item.description: A Chest holds up to 12 cubic feet of contents.

item.name: Climber's Kit
item.description: A Climber’s Kit includes boot tips, gloves, pitons, and a harness. As a Utilize action, you can use the Climber’s Kit to anchor yourself; when you do, you can’t fall more than 25 feet from the anchor point, and you can’t move more than 25 feet from there without undoing the anchor as a Bonus Action.

item.name: Clothes, Common
item.description: This set of clothes could consist of a loose shirt and baggy breeches, or a loose shirt and skirt or overdress. Cloth wrappings are used for shoes.

item.name: Clothes, Costume
item.description: This set of clothes is fashioned after a particular costume, typically meant for entertaining.

item.name: Clothes, Fine
item.description: This set of clothes is designed specifically to be expensive and to show it, including fancy, tailored clothes in whatever fashion happens to be the current style in the courts of the nobles. Precious metals and gems could be worked into the clothing.

item.name: Clothes, Traveler's
item.description: This set of clothes could consist of boots, a wool skirt or breeches, a sturdy belt, a shirt (perhaps with a vest or jacket), and an ample cloak with a hood.

item.name: Component Pouch
item.description: A Component Pouch is watertight and filled with compartments that hold all the free Material components of your spells.

item.name: Crowbar
item.description: Using a Crowbar gives you Advantage on Strength checks where the Crowbar’s leverage can be applied.

item.name: Fishing Tackle
item.description: This kit includes a wooden rod, silken line, corkwood bobbers, steel hooks, lead sinkers, velvet lures, and narrow netting.

item.name: Flask or Tankard
item.description: A flask or tankard can hold 1 pint of liquid.

item.name: Grappling Hook
item.description: As a Utilize action, you can throw the Grappling Hook at a railing, a ledge, or another catch within 50 feet of yourself, and the hook catches on if you succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check. If you tied a Rope to the hook, you can then climb it.

item.name: Hammer, Sledge
item.description: This two-handed, iron-headed hammer is good for smashing open treasure chests.

item.name: Hammer
item.description: This one-handed hammer with an iron head is useful for pounding pitons into a wall.

item.name: Healer's Kit
item.description: A Healer’s Kit has ten uses. As a Utilize action, you can expend one of its uses to stabilize an Unconscious creature that has 0 Hit Points without needing to make a Wisdom (Medicine) check.

item.name: Holy Water (flask)
item.description:
As an action, you can splash the contents of this flask onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a target creature, treating the holy water as an improvised weapon. If the target is a fiend or undead, it takes 2d6 radiant damage.

A cleric or paladin may create holy water by performing a special ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour to perform, uses 25 gp worth of powdered silver, and requires the caster to expend a 1st-level spell slot.

item.name: Hourglass
item.description: A standard hourglass used to measure the passage of time.

item.name: Hunting Trap
item.description: As a Utilize action, you can set a Hunting Trap, which is a sawtooth steel ring that snaps shut when a creature steps on a pressure plate in the center. The trap is affixed by a heavy chain to an immobile object, such as a tree or a spike driven into the ground. A creature that steps on the plate must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 Piercing damage and have its Speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn. Thereafter, until the creature breaks free of the trap, its movement is limited by the length of the chain (typically 3 feet). A creature can use its action to make a DC 13 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Each failed check deals 1 Piercing damage to the trapped creature.

item.name: Ink (1 ounce bottle)
item.description: Ink is typically used with an ink pen to write.

item.name: Ink Pen
item.description: Using Ink, an Ink Pen is used to write or draw.

item.name: Iron Pot
item.description: An Iron Pot holds up to 1 gallon.

item.name: Jug or Pitcher
item.description: A jug or pitcher can hold 1 gallon of liquid.

item.name: Ladder (10 foot)
item.description: This item is a straight, simple wooden ladder.

item.name: Lamp
item.description: A Lamp burns Oil as fuel to cast Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet.

item.name: Lantern, Bullseye
item.description: A bullseye lantern casts bright light in a 60-foot cone and dim light for an additional 60 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil.

item.name: Lantern, Hooded
item.description: A hooded lantern casts bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil. As an action, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to dim light in a 5-foot radius.

item.name: Lock
item.description: A Lock comes with a key. Without the key, a creature can use Thieves’ Tools to pick this Lock with a successful DC 15 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check.

item.name: Magnifying Glass
item.description: A Magnifying Glass grants Advantage on any ability check made to appraise or inspect a highly detailed item. Lighting a fire with a Magnifying Glass requires light as bright as sunlight to focus, tinder to ignite, and about 5 minutes for the fire to ignite.

item.name: Manacles
item.description:
As a Utilize action, you can use Manacles to bind an unwilling Small or Medium creature within 5 feet of yourself that has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition if you succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. While bound, a creature has Disadvantage on attack rolls, and the creature is Restrained if the Manacles are attached to a chain or hook that is fixed in place. Escaping the Manacles requires a successful DC 20 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check as an action. Bursting them requires a successful DC 25 Strength (Athletics) check as an action.

Each set of Manacles comes with a key. Without the key, a creature can use Thieves’ Tools to pick the Manacles’ lock with a successful DC 15 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check.

item.name: Mess Kit
item.description: This tin box contains a cup and simple cutlery. The box clamps together, and one side can be used as a cooking pan and the other as a plate or shallow bowl.

item.name: Mirror, Steel
item.description: A steel mirror is handy when you want to look around corners, signal friends with reflected sunlight, keep an eye on a medusa, make sure that you look good enough to present yourself to the queen, or examine wounds that you’ve received on hard-to-see parts of your body.

item.name: Oil (flask)
item.description: Oil usually comes in a clay flask that holds 1 pint. As an action, you can splash the oil in this flask onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. Make a ranged attack against a target creature or object, treating the oil as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target is covered in oil. If the target takes any fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute), the target takes an additional 5 fire damage from the burning oil. You can also pour a flask of oil on the ground to cover a 5-foot-square area, provided that the surface is level. If lit, the oil burns for 2 rounds and deals 5 fire damage to any creature that enters the area or ends its turn in the area. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

item.name: Parchment (one sheet)
item.description: A sheet of parchment is a piece of goat hide or sheepskin that has been prepared for writing on.

item.name: Perfume (vial)
item.description: A fragrant commodity typically used by the wealthy.

item.name: Pick, Miner's
item.description: A miner's pick is designed to concentrate the force of its blow on a small area.

item.name: Piton
item.description: When a wall doesn’t offer handholds and footholds, you can make your own. A piton is a steel spike with an eye through which you can loop a rope.

item.name: Poison, Basic (vial)
item.description: You can use the poison in this vial to coat one slashing or piercing weapon or up to three pieces of ammunition. Applying the poison takes an action. A creature hit by the poisoned weapon or ammunition must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or take 1d4 poison damage. Once applied, the poison retains potency for 1 minute before drying.

item.name: Pole (10-foot)
item.description: When you suspect a trap, you can put the end of your 10-foot pole through that hole in the wall instead of reaching in with your hand.

item.name: Greater Potion of Healing
item.description: The potion’s red liquid glimmers when agitated. When you drink this potion, you regain 4d4 + 4 hit points.

item.name: Potion of Healing
item.description: The potion’s red liquid glimmers when agitated. When you drink this potion, you regain 2d4 + 2 hit points.

item.name: Superior Potion of Healing
item.description: The potion’s red liquid glimmers when agitated. When you drink this potion, you regain 8d4 + 8 hit points.

item.name: Supreme Potion of Healing
item.description: The potion’s red liquid glimmers when agitated. When you drink this potion, you regain 10d4 + 20 hit points.

item.name: Pouch
item.description: A Pouch holds up to 6 pounds within one-fifth of a cubic foot.

item.name: Quiver
item.description: A Quiver holds up to 20 Arrows.

item.name: Ram, Portable
item.description: You can use a portable ram to break down doors. When doing so, you gain a +4 bonus on the Strength check. One other character can help you use the ram, giving you advantage on this check.

item.name: Rations (1 day)
item.description: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

item.name: Robes
item.description: A standard set of robes.

item.name: Rope, Hempen (50 feet)
item.description: Rope, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

item.name: Rope, silk (50 feet)
item.description: Rope, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

item.name: Sack
item.description: A sack can hold 1 cubic foot/ 30 pounds of gear.

item.name: Scale, Merchant's
item.description: A scale includes a small balance, pans, and a suitable assortment of weights up to 2 pounds. With it, you can measure the exact weight of small objects, such as raw precious metals or trade goods, to help determine their worth.

item.name: Sealing Wax
item.description: When you press a signet ring into warm sealing wax, you leave an identifying mark.

item.name: Shovel
item.description: Working for 1 hour, you can use a Shovel to dig a hole that is 5 feet on each side in soil or similar material.

item.name: Signal whistle
item.description: A small whistle used for signaling.

item.name: Signet Ring
item.description: Each signet ring has a distinctive design carved into it. When you press this ring into warm sealing wax, you leave an identifying mark.

item.name: Soap
item.description: A commodity used for bathing.

item.name: Spellbook
item.description: Essential for wizards, a spellbook is a leather-bound tome with 100 blank vellum pages suitable for recording spells.

item.name: Spikes, iron (10)
item.description: Standard iron spikes typically used with a hammer.

item.name: Spyglass
item.description: Objects viewed through a Spyglass are magnified to twice their size.

item.name: Tent, Two-Person
item.description: A simple and portable canvas shelter, a tent sleeps two.

item.name: Tinderbox
item.description: A Tinderbox is a small container holding flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a Candle, Lamp, Lantern, or Torch—or anything else with exposed fuel—takes a Bonus Action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

item.name: Torch
item.description: A Torch burns for 1 hour, casting Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. When you take the Attack action, you can attack with the Torch, using it as a Simple Melee weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1 Fire damage.

item.name: Vial
item.description: A Vial holds up to 4 ounces.

item.name: Vial of Acid
item.description: Improvised weapon, range (20), 2d6 acid damage.

item.name: Waterskin
item.description: A Waterskin holds up to 4 pints. If you don’t drink sufficient water, you risk dehydration.

item.name: Whetstone
item.description: A standard whetstone used to sharpen blades.

item.name: Bundle of arrows
item.description: Collection of 20 arrows.

item.name: Crossbow bolts
item.description: Collection of 20 crossbow bolts.

item.name: Battle Axe
item.description: 1d8 slashing, Versatile (1d10).

item.name: Flail
item.description: 1d8 bludgeoning

item.name: Glaive
item.description: 1d10 slashing, Heavy, reach, two-handed.

item.name: Greataxe
item.description: 1d12 slashing, Heavy, two-handed.

item.name: Greatsword
item.description: 2d6 slashing, Heavy, two-handed.

item.name: Halberd
item.description: 1d10 slashing, Heavy, reach, two-handed.

item.name: Heavy Crossbow
item.description: 1d10 piercing, Ammunition (range 100/400), heavy, loading, two-handed

item.name: Lance
item.description: 1d12 piercing, Reach, special.

item.name: Longsword
item.description: 1d8 slashing, Versatile (1d10).

item.name: Longbow
item.description: 1d8 piercing, Ammunition (range 150/600), heavy, two-handed.

item.name: Maul
item.description: 2d6 bludgeoning, Heavy, two-handed.

item.name: Rapier
item.description: 1d8 piercing, 	Finesse.

item.name: Scimitar
item.description: 1d6 slashing, Finesse, Light.

item.name: Shortsword
item.description: 1d6 piercing, Finesse, Light.

item.name: Trident
item.description: 1d6 piercing, Thrown (range 20/60), versatile (1d8). Look what you turned me into! Look what we've become...

item.name: Warhammer
item.description: 1d8 bludgeoning, Versatile (1d10).

item.name: Whip
item.description: 1d4 slashing, Finesse, Reach.

item.name: Club
item.description: 1d4 bludgeoning, light.

item.name: Dagger
item.description: 1d4 piercing, Finesse, light, thrown (range 20/60).

item.name: Collection of Darts
item.description:
1d4 piercing, Finesse, thrown (range 20/60).
100 darts.

item.name: Greatclub
item.description: 1d8 bludgeoning, Two-handed.

item.name: Hammer
item.description:
1d4 bludgeoning, Light, thrown (range 20/60).
Tool of the worker.

item.name: Handaxe
item.description: 1d6 slashing, Light, thrown (range 20/60).

item.name: Javelin
item.description: 1d6 piercing, Thrown (range 30/120).

item.name: Light Crossbow
item.description: 1d8 piercing, Ammunition (range 80/320), loading, two-handed.

item.name: Mace
item.description: 1d6 bludgeoning.

item.name: Quarterstaff
item.description: 1d6 bludgeoning, Versatile (1d8).

item.name: Short Bow
item.description: 1d6 piercing, Ammunition (range 80/320), two-handed.

item.name: Sickle
item.description: 1d4 slashing, light. Tool of the worker.

item.name: Spear
item.description: 1d6 piercing, Thrown (range 20/60), versatile (1d8).

item.name: Amulet
item.description: Cleric spell focus.

item.name: Cross of a Martyr
item.description: Cleric spell focus.

item.name: Crystal
item.description: Wizard spell focus.

item.name: Orb
item.description:
Wizard spell focus. 
Orb made for pondering.

item.name: Reliquary
item.description: Cleric spell focus.

item.name: Staff
item.description: Wizard and Druid spell focus.

item.name: Wand
item.description: Wizard spell focus.

item.name: Small metal frame
item.description: Made to hold a beaker in place over an open flame.

item.name: Glass Beaker
item.description: Beaker made of heat and chemically resistant glass. Don't eat it.

item.name: Mortal and Pestle
item.description: Made for crushing up alchemical ingredients. Can also be used for cooking.

item.name: Alchemical Pouch
item.description: A small pouch including contaning common alchemical ingredients like salt, powdered iron, and purified water.

item.name: Tubing
item.description: 5 feet of tubing with various attachable valves and heads.

item.name: Bag of Hops
item.description: A bag containing hops and yeast used for brewing.

item.name: Jar of Honey
item.description: High quality honey used for brewing.

item.name: Large glass jug
item.description: A sizable glass jug capable of fitting various attachments to aid in the brewing proccess.

item.name: Siphon
item.description: A siphon with an inbuilt filter. Can be used to purify water or alcohol.

item.name: Batch of Parchment
item.description: A sheet of parchment is a piece of goat hide or sheepskin that has been prepared for writing on.

item.name: Ink (1 ounce bottle)
item.description: Ink is typically used with an ink pen to write.

item.name: Ink Pen
item.description: Using Ink, an Ink Pen is used to write or draw.

item.name: Hammer
item.description: This one-handed hammer with an iron head is useful for pounding pitons into a wall.

item.name: Box of nails
item.description: A box containing 200 nails.

item.name: Handaxe
item.description: 1d6 slashing, Light, thrown (range 20/60).

item.name: Ruler
item.description: A foldable 150 cm or 5 feet long ruler.

item.name: Ink Pen
item.description: Using Ink, an Ink Pen is used to write or draw.

item.name: Calipers
item.description: A pair of calipers to help draw maps.

item.name: Parchment (one sheet)
item.description: A sheet of parchment is a piece of goat hide or sheepskin that has been prepared for writing on.

item.name: Ink (1 ounce bottle)
item.description: Ink is typically used with an ink pen to write.

item.name: Mapping Ruler
item.description: A half-circle ruler with messured degrees around the circle.

item.name: Compass
item.description: A compass proudly pointing north.

item.name: Jeweler's Tools
item.description: Jeweler's tools consist of a small saw and hammer, files, pliers, and tweezers.

item.name: Dagger
item.description: 1d4 piercing, Finesse, light, thrown (range 20/60).

item.name: Hammer
item.description:
1d4 bludgeoning, Light, thrown (range 20/60).
Tool of the worker.

item.name: Leather scraps
item.description: Scraps of leather in various sizes and types.

item.name: Tongs
item.description: The young and long tongs' tongue strung, sung and swung

item.name: Whetstone
item.description: A standard whetstone used to sharpen blades.

item.name: Hammer
item.description: This one-handed hammer with an iron head is useful for pounding pitons into a wall.

item.name: Charcoal
item.description: Charred coal except not.

item.name: Rags
item.description: An old hag's rags to nag.

item.name: Whetstone
item.description: A standard whetstone used to sharpen blades.

item.name: Cloth Scraps
item.description: Just a few cloth scraps.

item.name: Leather Scraps
item.description: Just a few leather scraps.

item.name: Hammer
item.description: This one-handed hammer with an iron head is useful for pounding pitons into a wall.

item.name: Pryers
item.description: A set of basic pryers.

item.name: Spool of Thread
item.description: I can't believe this is what happend to Little Big Planet™ Sackboy...

item.name: Set of Needles
item.description: A various assortment of needles. Useless on their own, but still a nice thing to hold onto.

item.name: Small Pot of Glue
item.description: Quite a sticky situation.
